summary: This is an email from June 3, 2008, with the subject referencing an article about a letter from attorney Gerald Lefcourt to Alexander Acosta. The email contains an attachment named 'Page_6_Article_re_Lefcourt_Ltr to Acosta.pdf', suggesting it pertains to legal correspondence or media coverage related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Gerald Lefcourt

persons.name: Alexander Acosta
persons.context: Mentioned in the email subject and attachment filename as the recipient of a letter from attorney Gerald Lefcourt. At the time, Acosta was the U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of Florida overseeing the Epstein prosecution.

events.title: Email regarding Lefcourt letter to Acosta

keyFacts: On June 3, 2008, an email was sent concerning an article about a letter from attorney Gerald Lefcourt to U.S. Attorney Alexander Acosta.
The attached document is titled 'Page_6_Article_re_Lefcourt_Ltr to Acosta.pdf', indicating it is likely a media article or legal document related to the Epstein case proceedings.
The correspondence highlights ongoing legal communications between Epstein's defense team and the prosecuting U.S. Attorney's office during the 2008 prosecution.
